You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of a 5x5 arrangement of cells, where 'X' represents an empty cell and '▢' represents a filled cell. There are a total of 10 cells, with 5 'X' and 5 '▢' symbols arranged in a symmetrical pattern. The filled cells are distributed in such a way that no two filled cells are adjacent to each other horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

There is a pattern of filled cells along the top and bottom rows, while the middle row alternates between filled and empty cells. The filled cells are contiguous in the top and bottom rows, while in the middle row, they are separated by empty cells.
